B

BeanTupleContainer - Class in org.vaadin.addons.beantuplecontainer
BeanTupleContainer enables using JPA 2.0 Tuple type-safe queries with lazy batch loading, filter, sort and buffered writes, and supports joins where more than one entity is returned (as is the case with joins).
BeanTupleContainer(BeanTupleQueryDefinition) - Constructor for class org.vaadin.addons.beantuplecontainer.BeanTupleContainer
Standard constructor for type-safe queries.
BeanTupleContainer(BeanTupleQueryView) - Constructor for class org.vaadin.addons.beantuplecontainer.BeanTupleContainer
